tasks.title: Initialize settings menu
tasks.description: Add a settings icon with dropdown in the header
tasks.details:
• Add a gear icon button to the header.
• Use DropdownMenu with a single "Preferences…" entry.
• Wire up open/close state and keyboard navigation.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Clicking gear opens the menu.
2) Esc closes it.
3) Focus returns to the button after close.

tasks.title: Implement theme toggle (light/dark)
tasks.description: Add a theme switch in settings; persist to store
tasks.details:
• Add theme toggle control in Preferences.
• Save to electron-store and apply immediately.
• Respect system theme as default.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Toggle changes theme instantly.
2) Restart keeps last selected theme.
3) System default applied when no preference set.

tasks.title: Add task search in list
tasks.description: Filter tasks by title with debounce
tasks.details:
• Text input above list with clear button.
• 200ms debounce.
• Highlight match in results.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Typing filters items after debounce.
2) Clear resets list.
3) Highlighting only affects visible items.

tasks.title: Autosave dirty document
tasks.description: Auto-save changes every 30s and on blur
tasks.details:
• Timer-based autosave if dirty.
• Save on window blur.
• Throttle concurrent saves and show status.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Dirty edit triggers autosave after 30s.
2) Blur triggers immediate save.
3) No overlapping writes.

tasks.title: Keyboard shortcuts
tasks.details:
• Add accelerators for search and settings.
• Prevent conflicts with editor bindings.
• Show tooltip hints.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Shortcuts open correct UI.
2) Do not trigger when input fields capture keys.
3) Works on macOS/Windows/Linux.
